ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/9/99 12:32:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I have found that it is actually  not always true.  It depends on the aggressiveness of the
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/9/99 12:32:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
kpatierno@... writes:

> When did the pet commands change?? .... I have always
> used the /pet guard here command to make cash. I would goto an area where
> a low level mob with good loot would spawn and give my pet the
> guard here command then I would go elsewhere and hunt some other mobs for
> loot. I recently tried this again and found that my pet would no longer
> attack
> a mob in guard mode unless the mob attacked first.
> Guess the days of making 10-20 plat in 2 hours are over :-(.
> Trinnes

I have found that it is actually not always true. It depends on the
aggressiveness of the mob and its level to you. Once your level difference
between monsters is too high, your pet will ignore it. Basically, the fight
has to be a bit of a challenge.

Also sometimes the monsters are aggressive enough to attack your pet, making
the fight happen.

Sonoroud
